com.andrewsummers.otashu.data

Class OtashuDatabaseHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.andrewsummers.otashu.data.OtashuDatabaseHelper

  • public class OtashuDatabaseHelper
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    NotesetCollectionOpenHelper is an SQLiteOpenHelper that simplifies connection access to application database.
